testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin) I want to be able to create a new visitor purpose record via API connection.
testcase.name: The creation of the new visitor purpose record to be created via the API must be verified via the API.

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: * The api user sets "api/addBloodGroup" path parameters.....................passed * The api user prepares a Get request containing the 514 information to send to the api addBloodGroup endpoint..undefined * The api user sends a GET body and saves the returned response.............skipped * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................skipped * The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "Success"..skipped

testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin) I should be able to access the Visitor Purpose List via API connection.
